Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lawrence/Ashland
ShortDescription: WB 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Clark, Wilson, Broadway, and Lawrence due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound # 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Clark, Wilson, Broadway, and Lawrence due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
